programme.title: T100 Triathlon - PTO - World Tour 2025 Final - Doha
programme.desc: The T100 Triathlon World Tour Final lands in Doha/Lusail (10–13 December 2025) as the season-ending showdown that crowns the T100 World Champion. Featuring the world-class professional field, the race is contested over the T100 format (2km swim, 80km bike, 18km run) on a course set around Doha and Lusail, with the decisive pro race scheduled for 12 December 2025 (09:45 AST) in Qatar.

programme.title: PSG vs Paris FC - French Ligue 1 2025/2026 Week 17- Mini Match
programme.desc: Two clubs from the Paris region will face each other for the first time in Ligue 1 since 25 February 1990, when Paris SG met Racing Paris. If Racing are considered being based in Colombes, this will be the first Ligue 1 match between two clubs from the same city since Paris SG-Paris FC on 17 December 1978. This will be the third meeting in all competitions between Paris Saint-Germain and Paris FC, following two draws in Ligue 1 in 1978. Paris Saint-Germain have not lost any of their last 38 home games against a promoted side in Ligue 1, with their last defeat coming against Montpellier on 15 May 2010.

programme.title: Espanyol vs Barcelona - Spanish LaLiga 2025/26 - Week 18 - Mini Match
programme.desc: Espanyol have not won any of their last 28 LaLiga games against Barcelona. Only two teams have gone 29 or more consecutive matches without a win against the same opponent in the competition's history: Real Sociedad against Real Madrid between 1957 and 1979 and Hércules also against Real Madrid between 1940 and 1984. FC Barcelona are unbeaten in their last 16 away LaLiga games against Espanyol, since a 3-1 defeat in January 2007 at the Lluís Companys. This run is only surpassed by Villarreal as their longest away unbeaten streak against the same opponent in the competition's history.

programme.title: Real Madrid vs Real Betis - Spanish LaLiga 2025/26 - Week 18 - Mini Match
programme.desc: Real Madrid lost their last La Liga game against Real Betis, 2-1 in March 2025, after having been unbeaten in their previous nine encounters. They have not lost two consecutive league games against Real Betis since 1999. Real Madrid have won just two of their last eight home games against Real Betis, failing to score in six of those matches – they have failed to score in six home games against the Verdiblancos in LaLiga since the 2017/18 season, at least two more than against any other opponent.

programme.title: PSG vs Paris FC - French Ligue 1 2025/2026 Week 17- Mini Match
programme.desc: Two clubs from the Paris region will face each other for the first time in Ligue 1 since 25 February 1990, when Paris SG met Racing Paris. If Racing are considered being based in Colombes, this will be the first Ligue 1 match between two clubs from the same city since Paris SG-Paris FC on 17 December 1978. This will be the third meeting in all competitions between Paris Saint-Germain and Paris FC, following two draws in Ligue 1 in 1978. Paris Saint-Germain have not lost any of their last 38 home games against a promoted side in Ligue 1, with their last defeat coming against Montpellier on 15 May 2010.

programme.title: EN Spirit of Sport Series 11 | E2
programme.desc: This month on Spirit of Sport, Real Madrid and England footballer Jude Bellingham takes us back to the start of his journey in Birmingham and opens up about his mental health. Ahead of the 2026 Winter Olympics in Milano Cortina, freestyle skier Eileen Gu reflects on her journey to gold. Cricket legend Sachin Tendulkar and tennis icon Novak Djokovic spotlight the transformative power of sport and how they’re using their platforms to give back. England Lioness Georgia Stanway visits a special football project in London to inspire the next generation.

programme.title: Leicester City vs West Bromwich Albion - EFL - English Football League SkyBet - Championship 2025/2
programme.desc: Leicester are unbeaten in their last eight league games against West Brom since a 2-1 home loss in November 2016. programme.title: Birmingham City vs Coventry City - EFL - English Football League SkyBet - Championship 2025/2026
programme.desc: Birmingham have won just one of their last 10 league games against Coventry, though it was in their last home meeting in April 2024. Coventry are looking to complete the league double over Birmingham for just the fourth time, previously doing so in 1965-66, 1974-75 and 2008-09.

programme.title: La Liga Highlights 2025/2026
programme.desc: "This 55-minute program offers full 5-minute highlights of each of the games played on Friday, Saturday and Sunday.LALIGA includes special video presentations of the best goal, the best save and the best player of the day."

programme.title: Espanyol vs Barcelona - Spanish LaLiga 2025/26 - Week 18 - Mini Match
programme.desc: Espanyol have not won any of their last 28 LaLiga games against Barcelona. Only two teams have gone 29 or more consecutive matches without a win against the same opponent in the competition's history: Real Sociedad against Real Madrid between 1957 and 1979 and Hércules also against Real Madrid between 1940 and 1984. FC Barcelona are unbeaten in their last 16 away LaLiga games against Espanyol, since a 3-1 defeat in January 2007 at the Lluís Companys. This run is only surpassed by Villarreal as their longest away unbeaten streak against the same opponent in the competition's history.

programme.title: Real Madrid vs Real Betis - Spanish LaLiga 2025/26 - Week 18 - Mini Match
programme.desc: Real Madrid lost their last La Liga game against Real Betis, 2-1 in March 2025, after having been unbeaten in their previous nine encounters. They have not lost two consecutive league games against Real Betis since 1999. Real Madrid have won just two of their last eight home games against Real Betis, failing to score in six of those matches – they have failed to score in six home games against the Verdiblancos in LaLiga since the 2017/18 season, at least two more than against any other opponent.

programme.title: Ligue 1 Weekly Review - 2025/2026
programme.desc: Each Ligue 1 Match week is condensed into a 52-minute highlights show. Every game, goal, penalty, red card and everything in between is squeezed into an action-packed hour to ensure no football fan misses a kick across the game season.

programme.title: PSG vs Paris FC - French Ligue 1 2025/2026 Week 17- Mini Match
programme.desc: Two clubs from the Paris region will face each other for the first time in Ligue 1 since 25 February 1990, when Paris SG met Racing Paris. If Racing are considered being based in Colombes, this will be the first Ligue 1 match between two clubs from the same city since Paris SG-Paris FC on 17 December 1978. This will be the third meeting in all competitions between Paris Saint-Germain and Paris FC, following two draws in Ligue 1 in 1978. Paris Saint-Germain have not lost any of their last 38 home games against a promoted side in Ligue 1, with their last defeat coming against Montpellier on 15 May 2010.

programme.title: Espanyol vs Barcelona - Spanish LaLiga 2025/26 - Week 18 - Mini Match
programme.desc: Espanyol have not won any of their last 28 LaLiga games against Barcelona. Only two teams have gone 29 or more consecutive matches without a win against the same opponent in the competition's history: Real Sociedad against Real Madrid between 1957 and 1979 and Hércules also against Real Madrid between 1940 and 1984. FC Barcelona are unbeaten in their last 16 away LaLiga games against Espanyol, since a 3-1 defeat in January 2007 at the Lluís Companys. This run is only surpassed by Villarreal as their longest away unbeaten streak against the same opponent in the competition's history.

programme.title: Real Madrid vs Real Betis - Spanish LaLiga 2025/26 - Week 18 - Mini Match
programme.desc: Real Madrid lost their last La Liga game against Real Betis, 2-1 in March 2025, after having been unbeaten in their previous nine encounters. They have not lost two consecutive league games against Real Betis since 1999. Real Madrid have won just two of their last eight home games against Real Betis, failing to score in six of those matches – they have failed to score in six home games against the Verdiblancos in LaLiga since the 2017/18 season, at least two more than against any other opponent.

programme.title: Fulham vs. Liverpool - English Premier League 2026/2027
programme.desc: Hugo Ekitiké has scored three goals in his last two Premier League away games, having scored just once in his first six on the road for Liverpool. He last scored in more consecutive away league games in December 2021. Fulham’s Harry Wilson has been involved in four goals in his last seven home league appearances, more than he had in his previous 20 at Craven Cottage.

programme.title: Fulham vs. Liverpool - English Premier League 2026/2027
programme.desc: Hugo Ekitiké has scored three goals in his last two Premier League away games, having scored just once in his first six on the road for Liverpool. programme.title: Manchester City vs. Chelsea - English Premier League 2026/2027
programme.desc: Each of Cole Palmer’s last nine Premier League goals for Chelsea have been scored in London. He’s not scored outside of the capital since December 2024, while he’s not scored north of London since August 2024. Erling Haaland has scored 11 goals in eight Premier League home games for Man City this season, netting twice in five different games. programme.desc: "This 55-minute program offers full 5-minute highlights of each of the games played on Friday, Saturday and Sunday.LALIGA includes special video presentations of the best goal, the best save and the best player of the day."

programme.title: Espanyol vs Barcelona - Spanish LaLiga 2025/26 - Week 18 - Mini Match
programme.desc: Espanyol have not won any of their last 28 LaLiga games against Barcelona. Only two teams have gone 29 or more consecutive matches without a win against the same opponent in the competition's history: Real Sociedad against Real Madrid between 1957 and 1979 and Hércules also against Real Madrid between 1940 and 1984. FC Barcelona are unbeaten in their last 16 away LaLiga games against Espanyol, since a 3-1 defeat in January 2007 at the Lluís Companys. This run is only surpassed by Villarreal as their longest away unbeaten streak against the same opponent in the competition's history.

programme.title: Real Madrid vs Real Betis - Spanish LaLiga 2025/26 - Week 18 - Mini Match
programme.desc: Real Madrid lost their last La Liga game against Real Betis, 2-1 in March 2025, after having been unbeaten in their previous nine encounters. They have not lost two consecutive league games against Real Betis since 1999. Real Madrid have won just two of their last eight home games against Real Betis, failing to score in six of those matches – they have failed to score in six home games against the Verdiblancos in LaLiga since the 2017/18 season, at least two more than against any other opponent.

programme.title: Ligue 1 Weekly Review - 2025/2026
programme.desc: Each Ligue 1 Match week is condensed into a 52-minute highlights show. Every game, goal, penalty, red card and everything in between is squeezed into an action-packed hour to ensure no football fan misses a kick across the game season.

programme.title: PSG vs Paris FC - French Ligue 1 2025/2026 Week 17- Mini Match
programme.desc: Two clubs from the Paris region will face each other for the first time in Ligue 1 since 25 February 1990, when Paris SG met Racing Paris. If Racing are considered being based in Colombes, this will be the first Ligue 1 match between two clubs from the same city since Paris SG-Paris FC on 17 December 1978. This will be the third meeting in all competitions between Paris Saint-Germain and Paris FC, following two draws in Ligue 1 in 1978. Paris Saint-Germain have not lost any of their last 38 home games against a promoted side in Ligue 1, with their last defeat coming against Montpellier on 15 May 2010.

programme.title: Espanyol vs Barcelona - Spanish LaLiga 2025/26 - Week 18
programme.desc: Espanyol have not won any of their last 28 LaLiga games against Barcelona. Only two teams have gone 29 or more consecutive matches without a win against the same opponent in the competition's history: Real Sociedad against Real Madrid between 1957 and 1979 and Hércules also against Real Madrid between 1940 and 1984. FC Barcelona are unbeaten in their last 16 away LaLiga games against Espanyol, since a 3-1 defeat in January 2007 at the Lluís Companys. This run is only surpassed by Villarreal as their longest away unbeaten streak against the same opponent in the competition's history.

programme.title: Lorient vs Metz - French Ligue 1 2025/2026 Week 17
programme.desc: Lorient have won 56% of their Ligue 1 matches against Metz, their highest win ratio against an opponent faced at least ten times in the top-flight. Lorient have lost just one of their eight home Ligue 1 matches against Metz, but that sole defeat came in their last encounter on 26 November 2023. Lorient have always scored when hosting Metz in the top-flight, only having hosted Sochaux more often while finding the net in each game.

programme.title: PSG vs Paris FC - French Ligue 1 2025/2026 Week 17
programme.desc: Two clubs from the Paris region will face each other for the first time in Ligue 1 since 25 February 1990, when Paris SG met Racing Paris. If Racing are considered being based in Colombes, this will be the first Ligue 1 match between two clubs from the same city since Paris SG-Paris FC on 17 December 1978. This will be the third meeting in all competitions between Paris Saint-Germain and Paris FC, following two draws in Ligue 1 in 1978. Paris Saint-Germain have not lost any of their last 38 home games against a promoted side in Ligue 1, with their last defeat coming against Montpellier on 15 May 2010.

programme.title: Al Ahli Saudi FC (KSA) vs PFC Nasaf (UZB) - AFC Champions League Elite 2025/2026 - West MD1
programme.desc: This will be the fifth AFC Champions League Elite meeting between Al-Ahli and Nasaf, with Nasaf’s only win coming in their most recent such game on 2 March 2016 ; Al-Ahli’s most recent game in the competition against Uzbek opposition was a 2-1 win over Pakhtakor Tashkent on 20 May 2019, a win here will see them win two consecutive such games for the first time in competition history. Al-Ahli are unbeaten in each of their last 18 AFC Champions League Elite games, including the final of the 2024-25 edition ; avoiding defeat here will see them equal Gamba Osaka for the joint third-longest such run in the competition.

programme.title: Jannik Sinner (ITA) vs Carlos Alcaraz (ESP) - Gentlemen’s Singles Final - Centre Court - Wimbledon 2
programme.desc: Top seed Jannik Sinner takes on defending champion Carlos Alcaraz in a blockbuster Wimbledon final. This is their fifth career meeting, with Alcaraz leading the head-to-head 3–1. Sinner is chasing his first Wimbledon crown, while Alcaraz aims for a historic third straight title. A generational battle on Centre Court.

programme.title: Amanda Anisimova (USA) vs Iga Swiatek (POL) - Ladies’ Singles Final - Centre Court - Wimbledon 2025
programme.desc: A first-time Wimbledon champion will be crowned as Iga Świątek faces Amanda Anisimova. Świątek, a five-time Grand Slam winner, reaches her first final at SW19. Anisimova, playing her maiden major final, stunned world No. 1 Sabalenka in the semis. This is their first-ever meeting. Experience vs momentum — who will triumph on Centre Court?

programme.title: Jannik Sinner (ITA) vs Carlos Alcaraz (ESP) - Cincinnati Open 2025 - ATP 1000
programme.desc: World No. 1 Jannik Sinner, holder of four Masters 1000 titles and 20 ATP singles trophies, comes into the Cincinnati final after winning two titles this season, including the Australian Open and Wimbledon. Across the net stands Carlos Alcaraz, with seven Masters crowns, 21 career titles, and five tournament victories already in 2025. Their rivalry remains one of the sport’s most exciting, with Alcaraz leading the head-to-head 8–5.

programme.title: Felix AUGER-ALIASSIME (CAN) vs Jannik SINNER (ITA) - Final - Rolex Paris Masters - Paris - 2025
programme.desc: The 2025 Rolex Paris Masters will be held from 27 October to 2 November at the new Paris La Défense Arena. Now in its 54th edition, this ATP Masters 1000 tournament features the world’s top players battling on indoor hard courts in both singles and doubles draws. With total prize money of €6,128,940, the event serves as the final major stop before the ATP Finals, promising a thrilling conclusion to the tennis season.

programme.title: Alejandra SALAZAR BENGOECHEA ESP Martina CALVO ESP vs Ustero Prieto/Araujo OR Sanchez Fallada/Josema
programme.desc: Premier Padel New Giza 2025, a P2 category event, takes place from 27 October to 1 November at the NewGiza Sports Club in Egypt. Featuring men’s and women’s draws of 32 pairs, the tournament begins with qualification rounds on 27–28 October. programme.title: Jannik Sinner vs Carlos Alcaraz - Men’s Singles Final - Arthur Ashe Court - Tennis US Open 2025
programme.desc: Two young giants renew one of tennis’s fiercest rivalries. Alcaraz, already a two-time Grand Slam champion and former US Open winner, leads their head-to-head by a slim margin. Sinner, the 2024 Australian Open champion, seeks to level the balance. A clash of power, speed, and mental edge with the title in New York on the line.

programme.title: Aryna Sabalenka vs Amanda Anisimova - Women’s Singles Final - Arthur Ashe Court - Tennis US Open 202
programme.desc: World No. 1 and defending champion Aryna Sabalenka returns to Arthur Ashe Stadium aiming for her fourth Grand Slam crown and successive US Open titles. Across the net, Amanda Anisimova reaches her first New York final after stunning Iga Świątek and Naomi Osaka. The American leads their rivalry 6–3, adding intrigue to a high-stakes clash. Victory would place the winner among the defining stories of the 125th US Open.

programme.title: Casper Ruud (NOR) vs Denis Shapovalov (CAN) - Final - ATP 500 Dallas Open 2025
programme.desc: Unseeded Denis Shapovalov faces second seed Casper Ruud. Shapovalov reached the final by defeating top-seeded Taylor Fritz and defending champion Tommy Paul, securing his second and third Top 10 wins of the week. Ruud advanced after a challenging semifinal against Jaume Munar, winning in a third-set tiebreak. This final marks Shapovalov's pursuit of his third ATP title and first above the ATP 250 level, while Ruud aims for his 13th career title.

programme.title: Nants vs Paris - LNH Division 1 - French Handball Starligue
programme.desc: Dive into the excitement of French handball with Liqui Moly Starligue, formerly LNH Division 1. Established in 1952, this premier league event features 16 top teams battling for glory. With Montpellier’s 14 Handball titles and Paris Saint-Germain's 11 wins, the competition is fierce. Champions earn spots in the EHF Champions League, while cup winners qualify for the European League.

programme.title: "AHMED ELMOHAMADYThe Three Peat" - Afcon 2025
programme.desc: "Following Egypt’s 2006 AFCON win, he established himself as a regular in the national team. Ahmed Elmohamady recounts the side’s three tournament triumphs between 2006 and 2010 and explains how his displays during that period secured a transfer to the Premier League."

programme.desc: The 2025 Africa Cup of Nations, commonly known as AFCON 2025, marks the 35th edition of this prestigious biennial tournament organized by the Confederation of African Football (CAF). This edition will be hosted by Morocco for the second time, following its previous hosting in 1988. Stay updated with comprehensive coverage of the AFCON Morcco 2025 on beIN Sports News.

programme.title: Countdown Show - Trophée des Champions 2026
programme.desc: The 2026 Trophée des Champions, also known as the French Super Cup, between Paris Saint-Germain and Olympique de Marseille will take place in Kuwait City at the Jaber Al-Ahmad International Stadium. Ahead of the main studio, “Countdown” covers the arrival of the teams and fans in the build up to the "Le Classique".

programme.title: PSG vs Marseille - Trophée des Champions 2026
programme.desc: The 2026 Trophée des Champions, also known as the French Super Cup, between Paris Saint-Germain and Olympique de Marseille will take place in Kuwait City at the Jaber Al-Ahmad International Stadium.
